Description:
Live Well!
Situated in one of Epping's most in demand locations, this home is positioned for the perfect lifestyle with easy access to all amenities including Lyndarum Shopping Centre, Aurora Village Shopping precinct including Coles and Aldi and plenty of cafes to choose from. Schools wont be a problem with plenty to choose from like Epping Views P.S, St Mary McKillop, Harvest Home P.S and the Edgars Creek Secondary College. Nestled on a generous 419m2 allotment with parklands at your doorstep.
This jewel showcases three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite, a central well-appointed kitchen with 900mm stainless steel upright oven and stove with plenty of bench space overlooking the main living and dining area flowing out to a picturesque decked alfresco area and low maintenance backyard, big enough to entertain the largest of gatherings.
Additional bonuses include; timber floors, ducted heating, cooling, ceiling fans, reading nook, laundry and a double car garage.
A great decision for any investor, down-sizer or the ideal home for young families and first home buyers. Invest with confidence or create your perfect lifestyle.
Insights: 14 The Well, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2019 and 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Genuine 5 bedrooms / 4 living zones
Perfectly suited to larger families or those that just love to spread out, this home offers 5 huge bedrooms including master suite with dedicated parents retreat / nursery. Master also offers a massive walk in robe and deluxe ensuite.
The open plan kitchen has recently been renovated with ample storage, first class cooking facilities and includes enough space for two fridges, there is a dining area adjoining the family room with built in Jetmaster heater, separate games room along with a rumpus / theatre room and the formal living room completes the four living zones.
Meticulously maintained by the current owners, the home includes an array of extras such as Wall-papered feature walls, alarm system, heating and cooling along with alfresco entertaining and double garage completes this perfect family package.
Situated in a quiet street in the ever popular Hayston Valley estate, there is nothing left to do but move in and enjoy. The days of feeling cramped and needing more space for the family will be long gone!
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection

Description:
Fabulous Value In A Prime Position
Fresh paint, glossy, recently polished timber floors, abundant natural light and surprising indoor and outdoor living and entertainment space are just some of the highlights in this exciting opportunity for first home buyers and astute investors.
Three bedrooms including a main with ensuite and walk in robe, lounge dining, family living and kitchen with meals are complemented by an enclosed veranda ready for year-round entertaining. Footsteps to Peppercorn Park and playground, Secondary College, and the bus to Epping Plaza, it's a short walk to Greenbrook Village and not much further to the station!
-Kitchen with stainless steel oven
-Large breakfast bench
-Oversize garage
-Shed
-Glossy just polished timber floors
-Fresh paint
-Ducted heating
-Air conditioner
-Fabulous walk everywhere location

Description:
Magnificent & Prestigious home in Lyndarum Offering Modern Comfort
Smart Location Real-estate is proud to present 8 LOUGHTON AVE, EPPING
This flawlessly presented family residence has the lucky number 8 also built on a massive Land size of 495m2. The house is surrounded by parklands and other amenities
You have found the one.
- Modern and Species open living area with windows all around overseeing the wonderful landscaped Palm Trees around the house
- Three massive bedrooms with mirror cupboards and great sunlight during the day
- An extra Living area /Cinema/ Rumpus for Kids & family (Upgraded/converted garage)
- Large open kitchen with stone Benchtop & amazing modern glass splash back.
- **Upgraded appliances Fisher & Paykel cooktop & 90cm Bosch oven (still under warranty)
- Large walk-in Pantry with plenty of space
- Lockup Shed is also good fully installed to the ground
- Lighting installed, downlights are fully changeable to (white/ orange) to suit your style living
- 1-minute walk to the nearest park for kids to play or family BBQ
- Solar Panels Installed & NBN
- Conveniently located within walking distance to Epping views
primary school, public transport, childcare, Lyndarum shops( Woolworth)
To secure this great opportunity with lots of potentials, contact Sam Al Qassim 0434 726 000

Description:
Entry level opportunity Waratah Gardens leptospermum building
Offering residents an inner city lifestyle in a more tranquil and serene fashion. This spacious ground floor apartment showcases a free flowing floor plan that makes living so much easier. Featuring a stylish kitchen with stone bench tops, quality s/s appliances which overlooks the large living area and meals area which opens out to a massive courtyard that will surely have you entertaining family and friends all year round. Also showcasing a large bedroom with BIR, massive central bathroom, laundry facilities, secure undercover remote parking, storage cage, intercom entrance for visitors and loads of natural light. Located with moments away cafes, eateries, Lyndarum shops, Epping Pacific Shopping Centre, Costco. Surrounded by multiple primary and secondary colleges, childcare's facilities and with a restaurant, medical clinic at your doorstep. Bus services only a hop, skip and a jump away make this unique apartment an ideal proposition for first home buyers, down sizers and savvy investors.

Description:
Elegance and Charm
Theres no place like home, thats the feeling you get upon entry with expansive hallway, timber flooring and subtle colour tone gives you a sense of warmth and comfort. Designed to accommodate the demands of all buyers, with four generous bedrooms, 2 stunning bathrooms and a separate formal lounge. An Elegant contemporary kitchen offering stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, and huge walk in pantry. The open plan meals and spacious living area lead you out to an amazing timber decked entertaining area and plenty of backyard space. Only minutes away from established schools and Aurora Village Shopping complex this is the ideal family home! Inspection is definitely a must for this one.

Description:
LOCATION MEETS LIFESTYLE
Nestled on approximate 576 sqm allotment in Epping, this quality home offers flexible accommodation with 2 separate living zones. A Study/Office to the front, spacious main family room in the central open hub of the home enjoying a generous meals area and accommodating kitchen with ample cupboard space . House comprising of 4 spacious bedrooms, the master bedroom boasts an en suite and WIR . Other three bedrooms with built in robs serviced by a sparkling clean central bathroom a .This convenient floor plan flows seamlessly in to the backyard for kids and pets to enjoy.
Situated in a peaceful pocket, a casual stroll to Lyndrarum shopping centre, Woolworth, Epping Views primary school, transport, surrounded by park-lands, and minutes' drive to Epping plaza,Costco shopping centre and Epping station.
Extra comforts include ducted heating and cooling, super-sized double garage with drive through access, and much more.
With everything at your doorstep this property truly is the whole pack

Description:
THE RIGHT SPOT
Spot the difference. Everything you desire; 3 bright bedrooms, main with full ensuite, built in robes, large loungeroom, step up to a separate meals area, beautiful large open kitchen, ducted heating + split system hits the hot spot. Double garage, with ample land left for the whole family to play (approx. 532m2). Spot on for location set in a cul-de-sac near train station, Westfield, Greenbrook shops, schools, parks & more. The right home, a bull's eye quiet pocket, the time is right. Secure your tomorrow right now.

Description:
A Renovated Home in a Perfect Location.
This family home represents astounding value considering its prime location & generous proportions just opposite a beautiful park. A Double storey house comprising of 4 spacious bedrooms, the master bedroom boasts an en suite and three bedrooms plus a study/nook serviced by a sparkling clean central bathroom.
Upon entering through the grand front door you'll be invited into a large lounge area filled with natural light. The updated modern kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances overlooking the open plan living and dining area are an entertainers delight. The convenient floor plan flows seamlessly in to the alfresco leading towards the spacious backyard for kids and pets to enjoy.
On approximately 688 square metres of land, there is ample room to move inside and out and offers potential whether youre a growing family or investor or developers alike (STCA)
A minutes walk to childcare centre and only moments away from Westfield Shopping Centre, South Morang train station and many local schools, parkland and local amenities.
If you're looking for a great home that is perfectly located, then this is one property you won't want to miss.
Additional Features:
Ducted Heating
Security Shutters on windows
Evaporative Cooling
Double Garage
Stone Benchtops and much more!

Description:
Family Home With Expansive Outdoor Entertaining Area
Beautifully maintained, this Epping home boasts a homely feel with plenty of space the whole family can enjoy.
Within close proximity to Westfield Shopping Centre, South Morang train station, and Mill Park Secondary, having everything at your doorstep adds to the convenience.
Featuring 2 spacious living zones, an open dining and kitchen area, a Master bedroom with a private ensuite and walk-in robe, 3 additional bedrooms, a well-appointed bathroom and laundry, and an incredible outdoor entertaining area, you've got it all in one fantastic home.
Modern floorboards in the main traffic areas, and carpet in the bedrooms and living rooms, this property also includes a fireplace, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, and ceiling fans to keep you comfortable all year round.
Be the host of the century and entertain family and friends in the well-thought-out undercover outdoor entertaining area. Concreted and fully fenced, there's ample room for birthday bashes, Christmas parties, NYE parties and more.
Call Jake Johnson on 0490043943 as an inspection is a must!
Additional Features:
Single-Car Garage
Room for additional off-street Parking
Shed in Backyard
Low-maintenance Gardens
Fourth Bedroom can be used as Study
Dishwasher in Kitchen
Wall Oven

Description:
Family Living in Aurora Estate
Boasting a fantastic position in the much-acclaimed Aurora Estate with park frontage, this lovely home is set to impress all buyers at all levels. Comprising of 4 generous sized bedrooms including master with ensuite and walk in robe, well-appointed kitchen with ample bench space including dishwasher and 900mm stainless steel appliances. Entertain guests with ease, with a large open plan living space overlooking your perfectly manicured rear yard with covered outdoor entertaining to cater all year round.
Fitted to the highest standard with an array of extras including downlights, quality window furnishings, evaporative cooling, zoned heating, ducted vacuum, fibre optic cabling throughout with data and TV points to every room, alarm system with remote controls, CCTV cameras viewable from smart phone, manicured front and rear gardens, recycled water, shed, double garage and only moments from all of Aurora Township's local schools, transport and the new Coles Shopping Precinct.

Description:
Quality Family Home!
Situated on a generous 606m2 block of land this family favourite delivers a comfortable well designed layout with plenty of living space for you and your growing family.
From the moment you walk in, you are greeted by quality finishes, stunning floorboards and high ceilings giving you a sense of grand open space. Immediately standing out is the large kitchen fitted with stainless steel appliances including walk in pantry, overlooking the main dining, family and covered alfresco area. The very spacious master bedroom is complete with a walk in robe and open double vanity ensuite followed by 4 generously sized bedrooms and serviced by a central bathroom.
Offering impressive extra's, such as ducted heating/ evaporative cooling, second living area, spacious laundry, an extra-large garage with drive through access and plenty of storage throughout.
Conveniently located close to schools, Epping North shopping centre, cafes, restaurants, parklands, and public transport, this home definitely has everything you are looking for and more.

Description:
Complete Family Package
A quality home with a practical floor plan and the flexibility to accommodate and entertain, every room is comfortably
proportioned and is enhanced with spacious indoor and outdoor living spaces. Sure to keep the whole family entertained all year round, the home enjoys a recently updated kitchen central to the homes open plan design with direct access to the covered entertaining area surrounded by a large private yard which offers a magnificent studio ideal for the kids or even to work from home.
Also offering:
- 3 x Bedrooms (main with FULL ensuite & Walk in robe)
- 2 x Bathrooms (main with spa)
- Renovated kitchen with plenty of cupboard space & dishwasher
- Lock up garage with drive through access
- Heating and cooling options
- Quiet court location with leafy outlook
- Fully landscaped 518 sqm (approx.) allotment
Centrally located within easy reach of both Westfield and Pacific Epping, bus stop at the end of the court and walking distance to the train station and a variety of popular schooling options you'll see why this needs to be on your 'must see' list.

Description:
CITY VIEWS ON 5,155M2 BLOCK!
Consisting of 4 bedrooms (master with ensuite, walk in robes & other 3 bedrooms with BIRS ). Its other features include formal lounge area, kitchen with laminex bench tops, plenty of bench & cupboard space, dishwasher, pantry and adjoining meals area, central bathroom with bath & shower and separate laundry. The home also includes gas heating, split system for cooling, alfresco, double lockup garage, and a generous sized rear yard with established gardens.
If you're looking for an affordable and well-kept family home in a convenient location then look no further. Situated within close proximity to local primary/secondary schools, Green brook & Westfield Plenty Valley Shopping Centre's, parklands, public transport, sporting facilities and so much more making this a MUST SEE property !
